item.title: NeuroGauss4D-PCI: 4D Neural Fields and Gaussian Deformation Fields for Point Cloud Interpolation
item.description: NeuroGauss4D-PCI masters complex point cloud interpolation using 4D neural fields and Gaussian deformation fields, achieving superior accuracy in dynamic scenes.
